text: The Citroën BX is a car produced by Citroën. It replaced the Citroën GS in 1982, an estate version was added in 1985 and was facelifted a year later in 1986. Another update occurred in 1989. It was replaced by the Citroën Xantia in early 1993 with the estate continuing until 1994. == Engines == * BX 14 46 kW (63 hp) and 55 kW (75 hp) * BX 16 53 kW (72 hp), 65 kW (88 hp) and 77 kW (105 hp) * BX 19 77 kW (105 hp) * BX 19 TZI 88 kW (120 hp) * BX 19 GTI 92 kW (125 hp) * BX 19 GTI 16V 109 kW (148 hp) and 118 kW (160 hp) * BX 18 D 44 kW (60 hp) * BX 18 TZD Turbo 66 kW (90 hp) * BX 19 D 51 kW (69 hp) BX Category:1980s automobiles Category:1990s automobiles
title: Citroën BX
